You can use one of the Features-Advantages-Benefits action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Marketing category to ask the AI Positron to create a marketing post in the features-advantages-benefits style from some initial content.
The AI action Features-Advantages-Benefits from a specific content is extremely useful to end users as it provides a clear and concise understanding of the product or service being offered.

By breaking down the features, advantages, and benefits of the AI action, users can easily comprehend its functionality and how it can fulfill their needs. The features highlight the various capabilities and components of the AI action, giving users a comprehensive overview of its offerings.
Select the content in the code block below and use the AI Positron Assistant Marketing->Features Advantages Benefits action to generate a marketing post.
body.codeblock: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant offers predefined AI actions, user-defined actions, and favorites for chat sessions. It provides features like editable chat interactions, AI fixes for errors, XPath AI-based functions, and custom author actions that invoke AI processing. The tool also supports Schematron validation and AI-based quick-fixes, refactoring actions, code generation, streaming mode for actions, and context-specific information.
